item.title: Rivian 发布自动驾驶人工智能芯片，放弃英伟达处理器
item.description: Rivian Automotive 公司开发出了自己的人工智能芯片，取代了 Nvidia 公司的技术，这是在未来汽车中增加和增强自动驾驶功能的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Rivian Automotive Inc. has developed its own artificial intelligence chip, replacing Nvidia Corp. technology as part of a broader push to add and enhance automated-driving features in future vehicles.】

item.title: 加拿大家庭净资产因市场反弹而创自 2024 年初以来最大涨幅
item.description: 加拿大家庭净资产的增长速度是自 2024 年以来最快的，其金融资产价值的增幅创下了历史之最。【原文：Canadian households’ net worth rose at the fastest pace since the start of 2024 as the value of their financial assets jumped by the most on record.】

item.title: 刚果推迟钴矿出口后将允许矿商保留 2025 年配额
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的钴矿产商将获准保留今年的出口配额，因为新程序的延迟实施阻碍了货物的运输。【原文：Cobalt miners in the Democratic Republic of Congo will be allowed to keep their allotted export quotas for this year as delays in implementing new procedures have prevented shipments.】

item.title: 报告称中国华为和中芯国际在芯片领域取得进展
item.description: 根据研究公司TechInsights对一款新手机部件的分析，尽管美国试图限制华为技术有限公司和生产合作伙伴中芯国际集成电路制造有限公司（Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. and manufacturing partner Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp. are making advances in chip production technology despite US attempts to limit their progress, according to analysis of a new phone’s components by research firm TechInsights.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率走高，30 年期贷款利率升至 6.22
item.description: 抵押贷款利率略有上升，增加了购房者的成本压力。【原文：Mortgage rates increased slightly, adding to cost pressures for buyers.】

item.title: 微软高管誓言：如果人工智能危害人类，将停止人工智能工作
item.description: 微软公司消费者人工智能主管穆斯塔法-苏莱曼（Mustafa Suleyman）一心想创造一种 "与人类利益一致 "的超级智能，并承诺如果这种智能对人类构成威胁，他将停止这项工作。【原文：Microsoft Corp. consumer artificial intelligence chief Mustafa Suleyman is bent on creating a super intelligence that’s “aligned with human interests” and pledged to halt such work if it posed a threat to people.】

item.title: 蒙大拿州的豪华滑雪场利用芒尼市场建造劳动力住房
item.description: 在迷人的落基山滑雪天堂蒙大拿州大天空市，大部分劳动力都住不起。【原文：Much of the workforce in the stunning Rocky Mountain ski paradise of Big Sky, Montana, can’t afford to live there.】

item.title: 乌克兰打击俄罗斯工厂，化肥库存上涨
item.description: 乌克兰称无人机袭击了俄罗斯西部的两家化肥厂，担心地缘政治紧张局势将影响关键作物养分的供应链，化肥股因此跳涨。【原文：Fertilizer stocks jumped after Ukraine said drones had hit two fertilizer plants in western Russia, on concerns that geopolitical tensions will affect supply chains for key crop nutrients.】

item.title: 欧元集团首任希腊首席执行官摆脱危机阴影
item.description: 希腊财政部长基里亚科斯-皮耶拉卡基斯（Kyriakos Pierrakakis）赢得了欧元集团主席一职的竞选，成为欧元区最高经济职位之一，这对曾经饱受危机困扰的希腊来说尚属首次。【原文：Greek Finance Minister Kyriakos Pierrakakis won the race to become president of the Eurogroup, clinching one of the euro area’s top economic jobs in a first for the formerly crisis-ridden nation.】

item.title: SpaceX 1.5 万亿美元估值目标取决于 "星链 "和埃隆
item.description: 要想在明年上市时以 1.5 万亿美元的估值购买 SpaceX 的股票，投资者就必须相信埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对其火箭和卫星制造商的银河系愿景，从轨道数据中心到月球工厂，再到火星上的人类定居点。【原文：To buy into SpaceX’s audacious $1.5 trillion valuation in a listing next year, investors will need to have faith in Elon Musk’s equally galactic vision for his rocket and satellite maker, from orbital data centers to lunar factories to human settlements on Mars.】

item.title: 量子系统公司将赢得价值 2.46 亿美元的德国陆军无人机订单
item.description: 由彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的初创公司量子系统公司（Quantum Systems）明年将获得一份价值 2.1 亿欧元（约合 2.46 亿美元）的合同，为德国军方提供无人侦察机，这一金额相当于该公司 2025 年全年预计收入的四分之三。【原文：The Peter Thiel-backed startup Quantum Systems is set to receive a €210 million ($246 million) contract to deliver surveillance drones to the German military next year, a sum that represents three-quarters of the company’s projected revenue for all of 2025.】

item.title: 瑞银称德意志银行是欧洲受影子银行影响最大的银行
item.description: 根据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的研究，在欧洲贷款机构中，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）对非银行金融机构的风险敞口最大。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has the largest exposure among European lenders to non-bank financial institutions, according to research from UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 电网运营商警告：2031 年起德国将面临电力短缺威胁
item.description: 电网运营商 Amprion GmbH 警告说，德国的电力安全在未来几年将恶化，从 2031 年起可能出现电力短缺。【原文：Germany’s power security will deteriorate over the coming years, with potential shortfalls from 2031, grid operator Amprion GmbH warned.】

item.title: 年末交易反弹，伦敦首次公开募股前景光明
item.description: 首次公开募股的后期爆发缓解了英国今年的交易荒，促使人们对期待已久的 2026 年复苏持乐观态度。【原文：A late burst of initial public offerings alleviated the UK’s deal drought this year, prompting optimism for a long-awaited recovery in 2026.】

item.title: 巴西石油产量在平台故障导致 11 月减产后反弹
item.description: 巴西的石油产量正在从上个月每天减少 30 多万桶的停产中反弹，这凸显了这个拉丁美洲最大的原油生产国是如何迷惑欧佩克微观管理市场的。【原文：Brazilian oil output is rebounding from outages that removed more than 300,000 barrels a day last month, highlighting how Latin America’s largest crude producer can confound OPEC efforts to micromanage the market.】

item.title: 欧洲股市随着经济相关板块的轮动而上涨
item.description: 由于市场对全球经济增长的信心增强，建筑材料和银行等与经济周期相关的板块受到市场追捧，欧洲股市走高。【原文：European stocks advanced as broader confidence on global growth sparked a rotation into sectors linked to the economic cycle, such as construction materials and banks.】

item.title: 甲骨文重燃对人工智能支出过高的担忧，美股下跌
item.description: 周四早盘，美国股市承压，原因是甲骨文公司的财报再次引发了人们对科技公司能否将其高昂的人工智能投资计划货币化的担忧。【原文：US equities are under pressure early Thursday as an earnings readout from Oracle Corp. reignited concerns about whether technology companies can monetize their lofty AI investment plans.】

item.title: 利率骤降，波兰银行面临抵押贷款再融资浪潮
item.description: 自波兰银行业开始采用固定利率抵押贷款以来，利率首次大幅下降，因此波兰银行业正面临着一波再融资需求。【原文：Poland’s revved-up banking industry is facing a wave of refinancing requests as interest rates plummet for the first time since the sector embraced fixed-rate mortgages.】

item.title: 霍华德-马克斯警告美联储进一步降息意义不大
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）警告说，随着回报环境的缓和，美联储围绕货币成本的 "操纵 "将驱使人们进行更高风险的投资。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s “manipulations” around the cost of money will drive people into riskier investments as the return environment moderates, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks warned, adding he doesn’t see the merit in interest rates being much lower than they are now.】

item.title: 迪士尼向 OpenAI 投资 10 亿美元，达成授权协议
item.description: 迪斯尼公司同意向 OpenAI 投资 10 亿美元，并向 OpenAI 的人工智能短视频平台 Sora 授权米老鼠和灰姑娘等标志性角色。【原文：Walt Disney Co. agreed to invest $1 billion in OpenAI and license iconic characters like Mickey Mouse and Cinderella to Sora, OpenAI’s short-form, artificial intelligence video platform.】

item.title: 德国表示将支持希腊领导欧元区财长会议
item.description: 希腊财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）表示，德国将支持希腊财政部长基里亚科斯-皮耶拉卡基斯（Kyriakos Pierrakakis）领导欧元区同行月度会议。【原文：Germany will back Greek finance chief Kyriakos Pierrakakis to head the monthly meetings of euro-area peers, according to Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil.】

item.title: 曼联大幅削减成本后仍在亏损
item.description: 尽管部分所有者吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）大幅削减了这家英超俱乐部的成本，但曼联股份公司的亏损仍在继续。【原文：Manchester United PLC’s losses continued, despite part owner Jim Ratcliffe’s drastic cost cutting at the Premier League club.】

item.title: 有关欧尔班计划的报道发表后，匈牙利债券随福林下跌
item.description: 据彭博社报道，匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）正在探讨在 4 月份的议会选举后改用总统制的方案，匈牙利的美元债券和福林随之下滑。【原文：Hungary’s dollar bonds and the forint slid after Bloomberg reported that Prime Minister Viktor Orban is exploring the option of switching to a presidential system after a parliamentary election due in April.】

item.title: 英伟达挑战者摩尔警告股价狂飙后的交易风险
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片制造商摩尔芯动科技公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co. warned investors about elevated trading risks after shares of the Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker surged more than eightfold in the first week after its initial public offering.】

item.title: EQT 收购其支持的机器人初创公司的 1 万个人形机器人
item.description: 私募股权公司 EQT AB 计划向其投资的公司部署 10,000 台仿人机器人，这些机器人由其投资的一家初创公司制造。【原文：Private equity firm EQT AB plans to deploy 10,000 humanoid robots to its portfolio companies that are made by a startup it has invested in.】

item.title: OpenAI 合作伙伴 Crusoe 聘请 MongoDB 前高管担任首席财务官和首席运营官
item.description: 为 OpenAI 和甲骨文公司提供服务的德克萨斯州大型人工智能数据中心综合体运营商 Crusoe 任命了一位具有公司上市经验的新首席财务官。【原文：Crusoe, the operator of a large-scale Texas AI data center complex for OpenAI and Oracle Corp., appointed a new chief financial officer with experience taking a company public.】

item.title: 假期过后美国申请失业救济人数创 2020 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数在感恩节假期周大幅下降之后，上周又创下了自大流行病爆发以来的最大增幅。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits rose last week by the most since the onset of the pandemic, after a big drop during the Thanksgiving holiday week.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚北欧公司收购失败后寻求债务和股权融资
item.description: 丹麦疫苗生产商巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）首席执行官表示，在私有化交易失败后，该公司可能会利用债务融资和股票市场为其发展计划提供资金。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S may use debt financing and tap equity markets to fund its growth plans after a take-private deal for the Danish vaccine maker fell through, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字意外缩减至2020年以来最小值
item.description: 由于出口激增，美国 9 月份的贸易赤字意外收窄至 2020 年中期以来的最小值。【原文：The US trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in September to the smallest since mid-2020 as exports surged.】

item.title: 加拿大自一月份以来首次录得货物贸易盈余
item.description: 由于出口大幅反弹，进口下降，加拿大自 1 月份以来首次录得贸易顺差。【原文：Canada recorded a trade surplus for the first time since January as exports rebounded sharply and imports declined.】
